GENERIC_INTERPRETATION: Scores in this range are associated with increased symptom burden and may warrant clinical evaluation.
SAFETY_SUICIDE_BODY: The patient has reported thoughts of self-harm on one or more days. Immediate clinical evaluation is required. This software does not provide real-time monitoring or crisis intervention. Tele-MANAS Mental Health Helpline: 14416 (24×7).
CLINICAL_INTERPRETATION_NOTES: This report presents standardized psychometric assessment results based on patient-reported responses. The findings should be interpreted in conjunction with a comprehensive clinical evaluation, including patient history and mental status examination.
LEGAL_DISCLAIMER: This report is generated by a software-based mental health screening software and is intended to support clinical decision-making. It does not constitute a clinical interpretation, treatment recommendation, or prescription. Final clinical interpretation and patient management decisions must be made by a registered medical practitioner. The software does not monitor patient safety in real time and is not a substitute for emergency or crisis care.
PRIMARY_ASSESSMENT_INTERPRETATION: This assessment provides an overview of the patient’s current psychological symptom burden based on standardized self-reported responses. The score and severity category should be interpreted in conjunction with clinical history, presenting concerns, and professional judgment. This tool is not intended to serve as a standalone screening instrument.
